lines.text: Yeah, I have a lot of gay friends too.
Virginity! Another test you have to undergo, that combines the two concepts that interest me the most... pleasure and pain! Pain, and pleasure.
You can't kill me. You owe me your life.

[referring to Michael Ransom]
Don't kill him. Just make him talk.

[preparing to torture Ransom with electricity]
I have a shocking surprise for you.
